#include <iostream>

using namespace std;

int main() {
	
    int a;
    cin>>a;
    
    while(a!=0)
    {
        int x,y,z,m,n;
        z=a%10;a/=10;y=a%10;a/=10;x=a%10;a/=10;
        m=x*y;n=y*z;
        if(m>9)
        cout<<m;
        else
        cout<<"0"<<m;
        
        if(n>9)
        cout<<n;
        else
        cout<<"0"<<n;
        
        //cout<<m<<n;
        m=m+n;
        if(m>10){
        while(m>0)
        {
            cout<<m%10;
            m/=10;
            
            
        }
        }
        else
        cout<<m<<"0";
        cout<<endl;
        cin>>a;
    }
	return 0;
}
